subtitle: This is a very easy fish dish. Serve with new potatoes and baby vegetables.

method.text: Season the fish inside and out. Dust with flour, shaking off any residue.
Heat the oil and butter together in a frying pan. Add the bacon and then the trout. Fry for about 5 min on each side.
Remove the trout and bacon from the pan. Keep warm.
Reduce the heat. Add the garlic and cook gently until soft.
Add the vinegar and bring to the boil. Add the chopped parsley and stir.
Pour over the fish. Serve on warmed serving plates.

title: Pan-fried trout with garlic and bacon
